a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual PM2.5 emissions from wildfires, 2003 to 2024
PM2.5 emissions represent the quantity of fine particulate matter (diameter less than 2.5 micrometers) released
by wildfires, in tonnes. The 2024 data is incomplete and was last updated 17 September 2024.
Data source: Global Wildfire Information System (2024)
Note: The 2024 data is incomplete and was last updated on the 27th of February.
